languages.text: "Да хранит вас {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Трон{/g}! Сделайте вид, что осматриваетесь — вам забрести в неположенное место, не вызывая подозрений, куда проще, чем мне... Найдите контейнер — он в дальнем углу — выбирайтесь и возвращайтесь ко мне! Я буду ждать!"

traits.locale_text: "Да хранит вас Трон! Сделайте вид, что осматриваетесь — вам забрести в неположенное место, не вызывая подозрений, куда проще, чем мне... Найдите контейнер — он в дальнем углу — выбирайтесь и возвращайтесь ко мне! Я буду ждать!"

languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Throne{/g} preserve you! Make it look like you're just having a look around — it's a lot easier for you to wander into a restricted area without arousing suspicion than it is for me. Find the container — it's in the far corner — get out and come back to me! I'll be waiting!"
languages.original_text: "Да хранит вас {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Трон{/g}! Сделайте вид, что осматриваетесь — вам забрести в неположенное место, не вызывая подозрений, куда проще, чем мне... Найдите контейнер — он в дальнем углу — выбирайтесь и возвращайтесь ко мне! Я буду ждать!"

traits.locale_text: "Throne preserve you! Make it look like you're just having a look around — it's a lot easier for you to wander into a restricted area without arousing suspicion than it is for me. Find the container — it's in the far corner — get out and come back to me! I'll be waiting!"

"Throne preserve you! Make it look like you're just having a look around — it's a lot easier for you to wander into a restricted area without arousing suspicion than it is for me. Find the container — it's in the far corner — get out and come back to me! I'll be waiting!"

"Throne preserve you! Make it look like you're just having a look around — it's a lot easier for you to wander into a restricted area without arousing suspicion than it is for me. Find the container — it's in the far corner — get out and come back to me! I'll be waiting!"

"Throne preserve you! Make it look like you're just having a look around — it's a lot easier for you to wander into a restricted area without arousing suspicion than it is for me. Find the container — it's in the far corner — get out and come back to me! I'll be waiting!"

"{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Throne{/g} preserve you! Make it look like you're just having a look around — it's a lot easier for you to wander into a restricted area without arousing suspicion than it is for me. Find the container — it's in the far corner — get out and come back to me! I'll be waiting!"

languages.text: “愿{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金王座{/g}保佑您！随便转转，不要引起别人注意。对您来说，在不引起怀疑的情况下进入那片禁区，要比我进去容易得多。找到那个箱子，它就在远处的角落里，然后回来找我就好了！我会等着您的！”
languages.original_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Throne{/g} preserve you! Make it look like you're just having a look around — it's a lot easier for you to wander into a restricted area without arousing suspicion than it is for me. Find the container — it's in the far corner — get out and come back to me! I'll be waiting!"

traits.locale_text: “愿{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金王座{/g}保佑您！随便转转，不要引起别人注意。对您来说，在不引起怀疑的情况下进入那片禁区，要比我进去容易得多。找到那个箱子，它就在远处的角落里，然后回来找我就好了！我会等着您的！”

languages.text: «¡Que el {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trono{/g} le guarde! Solo tiene que fingir que está echando un vistazo. Le será mucho más fácil que a mí colarse en una zona restringida sin despertar sospechas. ¡Encuentre el contenedor en la esquina del fondo y tráigamelo! ¡Estaré esperando!».
languages.original_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Throne{/g} preserve you! Make it look like you're just having a look around — it's a lot easier for you to wander into a restricted area without arousing suspicion than it is for me. Find the container — it's in the far corner — get out and come back to me! I'll be waiting!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Que el {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trono{/g} le guarde! Solo tiene que fingir que está echando un vistazo. Le será mucho más fácil que a mí colarse en una zona restringida sin despertar sospechas. ¡Encuentre el contenedor en la esquina del fondo y tráigamelo! ¡Estaré esperando!».

languages.text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}王座{/g}よ、ありがとうございます！何気なくあたりを見て回っているように見せかけてください―あなたなら誰にも怪しまれずに立ち入り禁止区域も歩くことができるでしょう。コンテナは一番奥にあります…探して持ってきてください！ここでお待ちしています！」
languages.original_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Throne{/g} preserve you! Make it look like you're just having a look around — it's a lot easier for you to wander into a restricted area without arousing suspicion than it is for me. Find the container — it's in the far corner — get out and come back to me! I'll be waiting!"

traits.locale_text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}王座{/g}よ、ありがとうございます！何気なくあたりを見て回っているように見せかけてください―あなたなら誰にも怪しまれずに立ち入り禁止区域も歩くことができるでしょう。コンテナは一番奥にあります…探して持ってきてください！ここでお待ちしています！」

languages.text: "Der {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Thron{/g} schütze Euch! Tut so, als würdet Ihr Euch lediglich umsehen – für Euch ist es viel leichter als für mich, gesperrte Bereich zu betreten, ohne Misstrauen zu erregen. Findet den Container – er ist in der Ecke gegenüber –, verschwindet und kommt zu mir zurück! Ich werde warten!"
languages.original_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Throne{/g} preserve you! Make it look like you're just having a look around — it's a lot easier for you to wander into a restricted area without arousing suspicion than it is for me. Find the container — it's in the far corner — get out and come back to me! I'll be waiting!"

traits.locale_text: "Der {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Thron{/g} schütze Euch! Tut so, als würdet Ihr Euch lediglich umsehen – für Euch ist es viel leichter als für mich, gesperrte Bereich zu betreten, ohne Misstrauen zu erregen. Findet den Container – er ist in der Ecke gegenüber –, verschwindet und kommt zu mir zurück! Ich werde warten!"

languages.text: « Que le {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trône{/g} vous bénisse ! Faites comme si vous étiez simplement {mf|venu|venue} jeter un coup d'œil. Il vous sera beaucoup plus facile de vous glisser dans une zone d'accès restreint sans éveiller de soupçons. Récupérez le conteneur qui se trouve au fond dans un coin et revenez me voir ! Je vous attendrai ! »
languages.original_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Throne{/g} preserve you! Make it look like you're just having a look around — it's a lot easier for you to wander into a restricted area without arousing suspicion than it is for me. Find the container — it's in the far corner — get out and come back to me! I'll be waiting!"

traits.locale_text: « Que le {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trône{/g} vous bénisse ! Faites comme si vous étiez simplement {mf|venu|venue} jeter un coup d'œil. Il vous sera beaucoup plus facile de vous glisser dans une zone d'accès restreint sans éveiller de soupçons. Récupérez le conteneur qui se trouve au fond dans un coin et revenez me voir ! Je vous attendrai ! »

languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Taht{/g} sizi korusun! Etrafa bakınıyormuş gibi yapın. Sizin yasak bölgede dolaşmanız, benden daha kolay olur. Şüphe çekmezsiniz. Uç kısımdaki sandığı bulun, oradan çıkarıp bana getirin! Sizi bekliyor olacağım!"
languages.original_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Throne{/g} preserve you! Make it look like you're just having a look around — it's a lot easier for you to wander into a restricted area without arousing suspicion than it is for me. Find the container — it's in the far corner — get out and come back to me! I'll be waiting!"

traits.locale_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Taht{/g} sizi korusun! Etrafa bakınıyormuş gibi yapın. Yasaklı bölgede sizin dolaşmanız benden daha kolay olur. Uç kısımdaki kutuyu bulun, oradan çıkın ve kutuyu bana geri getirin! Sizi bekleyeceğim!"
